mapper.insert: insert into cinebox_schedule( movie_id, movie_title, room_number, schedule_start_time, schedule_date, schedule_id, schedule_end_time) values( (select movie_id from cinebox_movie where movie_title=#{movie_title}), #{movie_title}, #{room_number}, #{schedule_start_time}, to_date(#{schedule_date},'yyyy-MM-dd'), schedule_seq.nextval, to_char( substr(#{schedule_start_time},1,2) +(select to_char(trunc(movie_runningtime/60)) from cinebox_movie where movie_title=#{movie_title}) ) || ':' || to_char( substr(#{schedule_start_time},-2) +(select to_char(mod(movie_runningtime,60)) from cinebox_movie where movie_title=#{movie_title}) ) )
mapper.select: select * from cinebox_movie where movie_status='screening' or movie_status='readysc'
select * from cinebox_schedule order by schedule_date desc

select * from( select distinct s.movie_id, s.movie_title , m.movie_age_grade from cinebox_schedule s, cinebox_movie m where s.movie_id = m.movie_id and s.schedule_date between to_char(sysdate) and to_char(sysdate+7) )
select distinct movie_id, schedule_date from cinebox_schedule where movie_id=#{movie_id} and schedule_date between to_char(sysdate) and to_char(sysdate+7) order by schedule_date
select schedule_start_time,room_number,schedule_end_time from cinebox_schedule where movie_id=#{movie_id} and schedule_date=#{schedule_date}

movie_title=#{movie_title}, movie_id=(select movie_id from cinebox_movie where movie_title=#{movie_title}),
